name: Dallas Cowboys at Washington Commanders

headlines.description: — The Dallas Cowboys had every excuse for starting the game with a thud. Instead, they roared out in front and made the most of a road trip on Christmas Day.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dak Prescott throws for 307 yards and 2 TDs to lead Cowboys past skidding Commanders 30-23

name: Detroit Lions at Minnesota Vikings

headlines.description: — Harrison Smith reveled in his moment with the roaring Minnesota crowd, blowing kisses during an extended showing on the videoboard near the end of one of his best games in a 14-year career.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vikings eliminate Lions with defense-dominating 23-10 victory, racking up 6 turnovers and 5 sacks

name: Denver Broncos at Kansas City Chiefs

headlines.description: — Broncos coach Sean Payton sent his offense back onto the field on fourth down Thursday night, the ball inside the Kansas City Chiefs' 10-yard line and less than 2 minutes left on the clock — and no intention of ever snapping it.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nix's late TD pass and stand by Broncos defense finishes off 20-13 win over Chiefs

name: Houston Texans at Los Angeles Chargers

headlines.description: — C.J Stroud’s dynamic first quarter was merely the opening act for the Houston Texans.
headlines.shortLinkText: Texans' defense swarms Chargers after offense's fast start in playoff-clinching victory

name: Baltimore Ravens at Green Bay Packers

headlines.description: — With their backs against the wall, the Baltimore Ravens made sure they wouldn't underutilize Derrick Henry again.
headlines.shortLinkText: Derrick Henry's virtuoso performance helps Ravens stay alive with 41-24 win over Packers

name: Arizona Cardinals at Cincinnati Bengals

highlights.headline: Bengals trounce Cardinals at home
highlights.description: The Bengals pick up their sixth win of the season as they win big over the Cardinals.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Bengals trounce Cardinals at home) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Ja'Marr Chase caught two touchdown passes from Joe Burrow, who threw for 305 yards as the Cincinnati Bengals beat the Arizona Cardinals 37-14 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ja'Marr Chase has two TD catches as Bengals breeze past Cardinals 37-14

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Bengals trounce Cardinals at home) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: Pittsburgh Steelers at Cleveland Browns

highlights.headline: Browns upset Steelers, leaves AFC North open
highlights.description: Steelers can't beat the Browns on the road and miss a chance to clinch the AFC North.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Browns upset Steelers, leaves AFC North open) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: New Orleans Saints at Tennessee Titans

highlights.headline: Saints win their fourth in a row as they down the Titans
highlights.description: The Saints move to 6-10 on the season as they win their fourth game in a row and beat the Titans.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Saints win their fourth in a row as they down the Titans) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — The New Orleans Saints may just have their quarterback of the future now with how Tyler Shough is playing for first-year coach Kellen Moore.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tyler Shough rallies the Saints with a big second half to beat the Titans 34-26

video.headline: Saints win their fourth in a row as they down the Titans

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Saints win their fourth in a row as they down the Titans) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: Jacksonville Jaguars at Indianapolis Colts

highlights.headline: Jacksonville Jaguars vs. Indianapolis Colts Game Highlights
highlights.description: Jacksonville Jaguars vs. Indianapolis Colts Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (Jacksonville Jaguars vs. Indianapolis Colts Game Highlights) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Trevor Lawrence took the Jacksonville Jaguars back to the playoffs with his nearly flawless work through the air.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trevor Lawrence runs for 2 scores as Jaguars close in on AFC South title with 23-17 win over Colts

video.headline: Jacksonville Jaguars vs. Indianapolis Colts Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (Jacksonville Jaguars vs. Indianapolis Colts Game Highlights) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Miami Dolphins

highlights.headline: Tampa Bay Buccaneers vs. Miami Dolphins Game Highlights
highlights.description: Tampa Bay Buccaneers vs. Miami Dolphins Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (Tampa Bay Buccaneers vs. Miami Dolphins Game Highlights) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: New England Patriots at New York Jets

highlights.headline: Drake Maye shines in Patriots blowout of the Jets
highlights.description: Drake Maye throws five touchdowns in the Patriots' 42-10 win over the Jets.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Drake Maye shines in Patriots blowout of the Jets) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Drake Maye and the New England Patriots took care of things on their end to become AFC East champions.
headlines.shortLinkText: Patriots get career-high 5 TD passes from Maye in 42-10 rout of Jets, win AFC East a few hours later

video.headline: Drake Maye shines in Patriots blowout of the Jets

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Drake Maye shines in Patriots blowout of the Jets) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: Seattle Seahawks at Carolina Panthers

highlights.headline: Seahawks move closer to an NFC West title with win over Panthers
highlights.description: The Seahawks take down the Panthers as they move closer to an NFC West title.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Seahawks move closer to an NFC West title with win over Panthers) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — The Seattle Seahawks are doing everything they can to wrap up the No. 1 seed in the NFC.
headlines.shortLinkText: Seahawks beat Panthers 27-10 for 6th straight win, still need to beat 49ers for No. 1 seed

video.headline: Seahawks move closer to an NFC West title with win over Panthers

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Seahawks move closer to an NFC West title with win over Panthers) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: New York Giants at Las Vegas Raiders

highlights.headline: New York Giants vs. Las Vegas Raiders Game Highlights
highlights.description: New York Giants vs. Las Vegas Raiders Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (New York Giants vs. Las Vegas Raiders Game Highlights) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — The Raiders' fate Sunday might have been sealed earlier in the week when management took three key players out of the lineup and placed them on injured reserve.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raiders in position for top draft pick after 34-10 loss to Giants

video.headline: New York Giants vs. Las Vegas Raiders Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (New York Giants vs. Las Vegas Raiders Game Highlights) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: Philadelphia Eagles at Buffalo Bills

highlights.headline: Eagles down Bills in thriller
highlights.description: The Bills can't connect on their two-point conversion attempt as the Eagles take the win on the road.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Eagles down Bills in thriller) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

headlines.description: — As Jalen Carter and his Philadelphia teammates celebrated in the end zone after making one last crucial stop, Buffalo’s Josh Allen removed his helmet and yelled out in frustration.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eagles hang on to beat Bills 13-12 when Josh Allen misses an open Khalil Shakir on 2-point try

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Eagles down Bills in thriller) 2025/12/28 ESHEET

name: Chicago Bears at San Francisco 49ers

highlights.headline: 49ers survive to beat Bears in high-scoring thriller
highlights.description: The 49ers stave off the Bears' late comeback attempt to win a 42-38 Sunday night thriller.

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (49ers survive to beat Bears in high-scoring thriller) 2025/12/29 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Brock Purdy and the San Francisco offense did everything they could for the first 58 minutes in a nearly flawless performance. At the end, they were just spectators when the beleaguered defense finally came through with a stop.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brock Purdy and the 49ers hang on to beat the Bears 42-38 and have a shot at top NFC seed

video.headline: 49ers survive to beat Bears in high-scoring thriller

tracking.trackingName: NFL_One-Play (49ers survive to beat Bears in high-scoring thriller) 2025/12/29 ESHEET

name: Los Angeles Rams at Atlanta Falcons

highlights.headline: Falcons fend off Rams for big win on MNF
highlights.description: The Falcons jump out to a big lead and survive a furious Rams comeback to earn a hard-fought victory.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Falcons fend off Rams for big win on MNF) 2025/12/30 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — A Los Angeles Rams team that spent most of the season competing for the best record in the NFL now is third in its division, saddled with a two-game losing streak and bound to open the playoffs on the road.
headlines.shortLinkText: Robinson runs for 195 yards as Falcons recover to upset Rams 27-24 on 51-yard field goal by Gonzalez

video.headline: Falcons fend off Rams for big win on MNF

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Highlight (Falcons fend off Rams for big win on MNF) 2025/12/30 ESHEET SOTFULL

name: Carolina Panthers at Tampa Bay Buccaneers
